cards.title: Gust Of Wind
cards.description: Create a 60-foot line of wind that pushes creatures 15 feet away on a failed save, slows movement toward you, disperses gas, and extinguishes unprotected flames. Can be redirected as a bonus action.

art_versions.prompt: High-fantasy illustration of the spell **Gust Of Wind**. Painterly, ArtStation / Wizards-of-the-Coast style. Dramatic, cinematic lighting; rich, detailed environment. Depict a **tiefling sorcerer** in mid-cast. Visualise the core effect: Create a 60-foot line of wind that pushes creatures 15 feet away on a failed save, slows movement toward the caster,…. Sharp focus, dynamic composition, aspect 3:4.

cards.title: Thaumaturgy
cards.description: Manifest a minor wonder within range: amplify voice, manipulate flames, cause ground tremors, create sound, open/close doors, change eye appearance. Maintain up to 3 effects simultaneously, dismissing as an action.

art_versions.prompt: High-fantasy illustration of the spell **Thaumaturgy**. Painterly, ArtStation / Wizards-of-the-Coast style. Dramatic, cinematic lighting; rich, detailed environment.
